name: Offworld Trading Company
summary: Mars has been colonized, and Earth's corporate titans fight to dominate this new market. Competition is fierce in this fast-paced economic RTS from Civilization IV Lead Designer, Soren Johnson.
info:

  • 平台: Mac OS

  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2016/4/28
  • 售价: ￥29.99
